meanings.definition: To be made up or composed of
meanings.sent1: The cake consisted of layers of chocolate and vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of players from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces consisted of funny shapes that made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork consisted of vibrant colors that danced on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The forest consisted of tall trees that whispered in the wind.

meanings.definition: To have as parts or members
meanings.sent1: The car consisted of four wheels and a steering wheel.
meanings.sent2: The committee consisted of experts in various fields.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich consisted of layers of cheese that hugged the ham.
meanings.sent4: His speech consisted of powerful words that echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The family consisted of loving parents and playful children.
